about.help: Gel Purification was retrieved from Youtube from the channel J. Christopher Anderson, and was created on 5/15/2014.

contents.params: After digestion, we need to gel purify our fragments.  For this, we'll run an agarose gel, cut the bands out of the gel, then purify the DNA using a purification kit.

pages.title: cloning cycle   runing a gel of our digestion

contents.params: Learn how to cut DNA bands out of agarose gels.

pages.title: cloning cycle   agarose gel DNA purification with zymo columns pt1
cloning cycle   agarose gel DNA purification with zymo columns pt2
